## CodeMetadata class

The metadata of a Smart Contract, as an abstraction.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class CodeMetadata 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(upgradeable, readable, payable, payableBySc)](./sdk-core.codemetadata._constructor_.md) |  | Creates a metadata object. By default, set the <code>upgradeable</code> attribute, and uset all others. |

|  [ByteZero](./sdk-core.codemetadata.bytezero.md) | <code>static</code> | { Upgradeable: number; Reserved2: number; Readable: number; } |  |
